nodes.text: The Banqueting Rotunda was a squat building located next to the Royal Palace of Naboo on the banks of the Solleu River in the city of Theed.

Construction of the Banqueting Rotunda began shortly after being commissioned by the Earl of Vis, first cousin to the Monarch of Naboo, King Ars Veruna. A squat building with stately columns and an adjacent tower, the banqueting hall was located off of Palace Plaza within walking distance of the Royal Palace.
